footer.main: All content is registered to Mastercard. You have permission to use, combine, change and edit all downloadable content from this platform. For any questions concerning rights management, user profiles and the system itself, please refer to amp sound branding:

page.title: Welcome to Sonic Hub

page.user not activated: Your account is not yet activated, you will receive an email upon activation of your account. Please contact {{adminEmail}} in case you did not receive mail within 12 hours.

page.userDisabledForAllBrands: Your company has been disabled for all brands. Please contact our support team at {{adminEmail}} to resolve this issue and regain access to your account
page.sso user: Your account is registered with SSO. Please log in using SSO.
page.approved user: Your account is approved, please check your mail to set your password or click on Forget password to set your password.

dowloadWAV.title: Please provide some information
dowloadWAV.alertDownloadPopup: Once you download the project, no further changes can be made, and it will be marked as completed. Are you sure you want to proceed?

AISearch.title: AI Music Search
AISearch.subtitle: Discover the Perfect Track with AI-Powered Search.
AISearch.optionSelectionTitle: Upload a video, share a brief, or select a similar trackâ€”our AI instantly matches the perfect music to your project. Simple, fast, and precise.
AISearch.GenerateMusicWithVideoTitle: Recommend Music That Fits Your Video
AISearch.GenerateMusicWithVideoSubtitle: This tool analyses your video's style and mood, then uses advanced AI to search for custom music that fits seamlessly with the visuals.
AISearch.GenerateMusicWithBriefSubtitle: Share a brief or relevant keywords, and our AI will find the ideal custom track that matches your specific style and mood.
AISearch.GenerateSimilaritySearchSubtitle: Search for a song you love and we'll recommend similar tracks that align with its style and mood.
AISearch.ProcessingText: AI analysis will take some time to process. You can explore other projects meanwhile.

CustomTrackForm.title: Commission a Custom Music Track
CustomTrackForm.subtitle: Provide project details so that we can create the perfect branded audio for you
CustomTrackForm.projectTitlePlaceholder: Give a name to your project
CustomTrackForm.focusofContentTitle: What's the Focus of Your Content?*
CustomTrackForm.focusofContentPlaceholder: e.g. Introduction of amp's Sonic Space product along with its core features in an engaging way, with music supporting this goal.
CustomTrackForm.creativeBrieftitle: Do you have a creative brief?
CustomTrackForm.KeywordsPlaceholder: e.g. A melancholic yet hopeful piano piece with ambient textures, subtle strings, and a soft ticking sound to evoke the passage of time. The composition should feel intimate and cinematic, gradually building in intensity while maintaining a sense of introspection and emotional depth.
CustomTrackForm.musicInspirationSubTitle: Are there any tracks that inspire this project? Search or paste a link to find the tracks you have in mind.
CustomTrackForm.linkPlaceholder: Paste a link from Youtube, SoundCloud, Vimeo, etc.
CustomTrackForm.customTrackConfirmationModalTitle: Once you submit your request, you won't be able to add any more details or share additional information about this project. Are you sure you want to proceed?
CustomTrackForm.energyTempo: Do you have an energy & tempo in mind?
CustomTrackForm.tonalties: Which of these tonalities match your campaign?
CustomTrackForm.genres: Which of these genres do you feel are appropriate?
CustomTrackForm.visualRefSubTitle: Do you have a work-in-progress, final version, or any visual references?
CustomTrackForm.ThankyouTitle: Thank you for submitting your request!
CustomTrackForm.thankyouPoint1: 1. Our team will review your request and get back to you in the next days.
CustomTrackForm.thankyouPoint2: 2. If you need any urgent assistance please contact sonicspace@ampcontact.com.
